product_name: WD-40 BIKE Foaming Bike Wash - 33.8 fl. oz.
long_description: An essential for daily commuters or mountain bikers, the biodegradable WD-40 BIKE Foaming Bike wash in the 33.8 oz. bottle uses dirt-eating suds remove the most stubborn grime. Biodegradable and safe for carbon fiber, titanium, aluminum, steel, chrome, rubber or plastic, the WD-40 BIKE Foaming Bike wash leaves your ride sparkling clean.
short_description: An essential for daily commuters or mountain bikers, the biodegradable WD-40 BIKE Foaming Bike wash in the 33.8 oz. bottle uses dirt-eating suds remove the most stubborn grime.
